extensionAttribute.displayName: Mac OS X Server - Serial Number
extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the server serial number for Mac OS X Server.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh #Check to see if we are running Mac OS X Server if [ -f "/usr/sbin/serveradmin" ]; then OS=`/usr/bin/sw_vers -productVersion | /usr/bin/colrm 5` if [[ "$OS" > "10.5" ]]; then result=`/System/Library/ServerSetup/serverserialnumberutil -get | cut -c 1-40` echo "<result>$result</result>" else result=`/System/Library/ServerSetup/serversetup -getServerSerialNumber | cut -c 1-40` echo "<result>$result</result>" fi fi
